cd ${PKG_ROOT}
go run ${WORK}/main.go
cd ${WORK}
cmp stdout want.txt

-- main.go --
package main

import . "github.com/efd6/dispear"

func main() {
	DESCRIPTION("append")

	APPEND("dst", "val")
	APPEND("dst", 1)
	APPEND("dst", 1.5)
	APPEND("dst", true)
	APPEND("dst", false)

	Generate()
}
-- want.txt --
---
description: append
processors:
  - append:
      tag: append_dst_1
      field: dst
      value: val
  - append:
      tag: append_dst_2
      field: dst
      value: 1
  - append:
      tag: append_dst_3
      field: dst
      value: 1.5
  - append:
      tag: append_dst_4
      field: dst
      value: true
  - append:
      tag: append_dst_5
      field: dst
      value: false
